nodes.bodyText: This is similar to asof join. Can we make factory constructor a functional interface? These factories take the same args. This way we can remove code duplication
this is good candidate for a list lookup and branch removal
another list lookup, also feels that for implied timestamp we should use same joins that participate in requiredTimestamp just above. Do you mind checking why CROSS join isn't present here?
could we make this a static final variable? Annoyingly this is an allocating call in java

I mean sparse array. I wouldn't think loop is faster than || comparison. Probably not. Using sparse array lookup will look like:
boolean requiresTimeatamp = joinsRequiringTimestamp[model.getJoinType()];
